name: Date or Death
description:
Synopsis

You are an 18 year old high school student. You have a very beautiful and caring girlfriend, her name is Amel. She is very kind and very loyal. Her loyalty is like you are the only man in this world. In your dating journey you will try to make him always happy even though you have to "repeat" his daily activities. What ending can you get? show me.

Play Guide

1. Find the route to a certain ending, by choosing the options that you can choose.

2. To get / unlock Extra Content, Reach True Ending / reach lv 3.

3. The bigger your level, the more cooldown time in choosing an option/route will be. In addition there are some content that can only be unlocked if you have reached a certain level.

4. Don't rush.
